description:
With the Stork back up and running, Midge and the others finally make it off the sand planet and set a course once more for Earth. But their relief is cut short when the Stork is suddenly sucked into yet another mysterious force. The gang wake up in a dreamlike world and meet Wang, the water bear, and he explains that they were sucked into a black hole that is part of an elaborate garbage disposal system. Ready to escape from his imaginary world, Wang asks the group to take him with them back to Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Black Hole Resident / Garbage Field at the End of the Galaxy
Black Hole no Juunin / Ginga no Hate no Gomitameba
ブラックホールの住人 / 銀河の果てのゴミため場
